name: Gryadki na pyatki.
description:
PvP in a fairy-tale style, where players of the same team face each other. The action takes place on the map selected by the player, the task of which is to capture the enemy flag as many times as possible, thereby gaining points that can be spent on improving the character.

PS:
Errors in the client:
1) Not all characters can be selected, while only the first two workers.
2) UI is displayed correctly on all devices.
3) Some animation does not play correctly.
